text: Alyssa Milano (born December 19, 1972) is an American actress. She is best known for her appearance in the 1980s television series Who's The Boss?. She was one of the stars of The WB's series Charmed since 1998. Milano was born in Bensonhurst, Brooklyn. She moved to Great Kills, Staten Island early in her life. In 2015, Milano supported Bernie Sanders for President of the United States in the 2016 presidential election. In October 2017, Milano helped popularized the #MeToo movement, an international internet movement, to raise awareness of the dangers and victims of sexual abuse and sexual harassment. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Alyssa Milano on fernsehserien.tv Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:Actors from Staten Island Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Musicians from Staten Island Category:Singers from New York City
title: Alyssa Milano
